# Publications

## Anatomy of Turkish Credit Growth: Credit Booms to Profit Busts

This study examines the rapid credit expansion periods from local branches of the banks to the private non-financial sector between 2009 and 2019 in Turkey along with the effect of credit expansion on the balances and profits of the Turkish private non-financial sector and the possible outcomes that expansion in the pandemic era.

[! Link !](https://aiasci.github.io/credit/)

# Projects

## Plotly Dashboard

I created a free dashboard by using Plotly. Data in tables are about Turkish private-non financial sector income statements and balances.

[! Link !](https://aiasci.github.io/firm_dashboard/)

## Web Scrapping with R

A simple web scraping example. By using data from Wikipedia pages inspects the relationship between education and life expectancy. Includes interactive Plotly maps.

[! Link !](https://aiasci.github.io/web_scrap_r/)

## Shiny App

A search engine for the Turkish Presidency of Strategy and Budget [(SBB)](https://www.sbb.gov.tr/) yearly reports. Gives occurrences of the phrases with text analysis.

[! Link !](https://aiasci.shinyapps.io/searcher/)
